mapper.select: SELECT m.member_gender ,m.member_dongAddr ,p.pro_dogName ,p.pro_dogAge ,p.pro_dogGender ,p.pro_dogDesc ,bt.breedType FROM member m LEFT JOIN pro p ON m.member_idx = p.member_idx LEFT JOIN breed b ON p.pro_idx = b.pro_idx LEFT JOIN `char` c ON p.pro_idx = c.pro_idx LEFT JOIN breedtype bt ON b.breedType_code = bt.breedType_code WHERE p.pro_idx = 1 GROUP BY m.member_dongAddr, p.pro_dogName, p.pro_dogAge, p.pro_dogGender
select charType from pro p INNER JOIN `char` c ON p.pro_idx = c.pro_idx INNER JOIN chartype ct ON c.charType_code = ct.charType_code where p.pro_idx=1;
